top_problem_solved: After hiring 2 agencies. One of my client came with us through the reference. So he just came up with an idea, that this type of business idea I have and now Yesha what you can offer me the best. So I understood his business, Then I suggested to him that this is the type of thing we can do. He just loved the process of our research, and how I explained him the business flow, Branding & marketing flow. The process of branding, campaign design and understand their audience, at what time with which tagline do we have to do promotions? What Color palette do you require for your brand? Why this color palette? Why this font? Why this brand guideline? My this tagline? Why this advertisement? Why this poster? How does this impact customers' minds? How to promote on Social media? What will be the correct flow? All this we explained to them. After that, he passed 2 more refences. Here I would say works do speak..
